title: Krowarzywa - Marszalkowska
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Its 2nd outlet in the city, opened May 2015. A vegan burger joint offering burgers made of tofu, seitan, millet, chickpeas, and vegetables all served in a bun with sauce of your choice. Uses local and seasonal produce. Serves fair trade coffee and tea, fruit and vegetable juices and cakes and cookies.
